org.eclipse.papyrus.sysml14.diagram.common.internal.factory

Class AbstractBasicViewFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.papyrus.sysml14.diagram.common.internal.factory.AbstractBasicViewFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.diagram.core.view.factories.ViewFactory, IBasicViewFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlowPortViewFactory, SysMLConnectorViewFactory

    public abstract class AbstractBasicViewFactory
extends Object
implements IBasicViewFactory
    This abstract view factory is used to allow reuse code from GMF generated diagram

      • createLabel

        protected org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.notation.Node createLabel(org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.notation.View owner,
                                                            String hint)
        This method is used to create a label in the context of based GMF diagram
        Parameters:
        owner - the container of the new view
        hint - the number that is associated to the created view
        Returns:
        the decoration node that is the serialization of the label

      • createCompartment

        protected org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.notation.Node createCompartment(org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.notation.View owner,
                                                                  String hint,
                                                                  boolean canCollapse,
                                                                  boolean hasTitle,
                                                                  boolean canSort,
                                                                  boolean canFilter)
        This method comes from GMF based generation diagram it is sued to create compartment.
        Parameters:
        owner - the container of the compartment
        hint - the number that will be associated to the node
        canCollapse - true if the compartment can be collapse
        hasTitle - true if the compartment can have a title
        canSort - true if the compartment can be sorted
        canFilter - true if the compartment can be filtered
        Returns:
        the created compartment
